Organizational Structure

This Module focuses on task allocation and coordinations and how they meet Together Culture's Aims, goals and achievements .

Creative leadership

Members enrolled to this module can learn about the different leadership styles and their effectiveness and limitations which would equip them with the required skills for leadership of the organization.

Entrepreneurial skills Management

This module covers the major skills needed for entrepreneurship. This includes Time management, Financial Management, problem solving, creativity and critical thinking.

Momentum

This module allows for members to learn the importance of consistency in member contributions, welcoming new members to the Together Culture and member retention.

Resources and Facilities

Members learn about the resources available at Together culture and how to effectively utilize them. This includes the Library with the different books and journals and member contributions to the trust fund for future projects.
